explains: n. 路，道；途径，路径；神经通路

sentences.en: Richard was coming up the pathway.
Diplomacy will smooth your pathway to success.
sentences.cn: 良好的交际会铺平你的成功之路。

sentences.en: In the early sixties, programmed learning was looked on as the pathway to mechanize the learning process.
sentences.cn: 在六十年代早期，程序化学习被看作是机械化学习过程的途径。
